amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike four sections of the bill which would add new restrictions to prevent the Administration from closing the Guantanamo Bay Detention Camp.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 6 printed in House Report 114-155 to strike four sections of the bill which add new restrictions to prevent the Administration from closing the Guantanamo Bay Detention Camp.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 246 (Roll no. 367).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Schiff.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 246 (Roll no. 367).
